name: Peter JESRALY, Appellant, v. TANGLWOOD LAKES, INC., Appellees

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
LARSEN, J., files a dissenting opinion.
parties: Peter JESRALY, Appellant, v. TANGLWOOD LAKES, INC., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF COURT
PER CURIAM.
The Order of Superior Court is affirmed. See, Petry v. Tanglwood, Lakes, Inc., (J-203-1986), 514 Pa. 51, 522 A.2d 1053 (1987).
LARSEN, J., files a dissenting opinion.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

opinions.text:
LARSEN, Justice, dissenting.
I dissent. This is a companion case to Petry v. Tanglwood Lakes, Inc., 514 Pa. 51, 522 A.2d 1053 (1987) and Babaian v. Tanglwood Lakes, Inc. and Tanglwood Lakes Community Association, 516 Pa. 47, 531 A.2d 1388 (1987). All three cases arise out of the same factual background and involve identical legal and equitable issues. I dissented in Petry and Babaian; I do likewise here.
For the reasons set forth in my dissenting opinions in Petry and Babaian, I would reverse the order of the Superior Court and remand this case to the lower court for an order directing the appellees to answer the complaint in equity.
opinions.author: LARSEN, Justice, dissenting.

attorneys: Chester T. Harhut, Michael J. Donohue, Scranton, for appellant.
William C. Gumble, Steven R. Guccini, Paupack, for Tanglwood Lakes, Inc.
Randolph T. Border, Hawley, Anthony Magnotta, Scranton, for Tanglwood Lakes Community Ass’n.
casebody.head_matter:
531 A.2d 1390
Peter JESRALY, Appellant, v. TANGLWOOD LAKES, INC., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1986.
Decided Oct. 15, 1987.
Chester T. Harhut, Michael J. Donohue, Scranton, for appellant.
William C. Gumble, Steven R. Guccini, Paupack, for Tanglwood Lakes, Inc.
Randolph T. Border, Hawley, Anthony Magnotta, Scranton, for Tanglwood Lakes Community Ass’n.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
